SELECT aaa.advert_id AS advertId, aaa.advert_name AS advertName, NVL(aaa.pv , 0) AS pv, NVL(aaa.uv , 0) AS uv FROM (SELECT t.advert_id, MAX(t.advert_name) AS advert_name, COUNT(1) AS pv, COUNT(DISTINCT p.ip) AS uv FROM MALL.MALL_TB_ADVERT t, MALL.MALL_TB_ADVERT_STATS p WHERE t.advert_id = p.advert_id AND t.state = 'U' AND p.state = 'U' AND p.create_date >= TRUNC(sysdate-7) AND t.shop_id = #shopId# GROUP BY t.advert_id ORDER BY uv DESC ) aaa WHERE rownum < 6
